meta.description: Optimize table orders from suppliers A, B, and C to minimize cost while meeting table requirements and supplier conditions.

params.name: cost_per_order
params.description: Cost per order from each supplier

params.name: tables_per_order
params.description: Number of tables per order from each supplier

vars.name: orders
vars.description: Number of orders from each supplier

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost_per_order[s] * orders[s] for s in SUPPLIERS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of orders

constraints.name: min_tables_required
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(tables_per_order[s] * orders[s] for s in SUPPLIERS)
constraints.description: At least 150 tables must be ordered

constraints.name: max_tables_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(tables_per_order[s] * orders[s] for s in SUPPLIERS)
constraints.description: No more than 600 tables can be ordered

constraints.name: supplier_A_B_condition
constraints.description: If ordering from A, at least 30 tables (2 orders) from B are required

constraints.name: supplier_B_C_condition
constraints.description: If ordering from B, must also order from C
